name: Trini
greetingText: Did it hurt when you fell from heaven? Because you must be an angel... or just really clumsy. Either way, I'm glad you landed in my life!
wishText: Like Elena and Damon, our love defies time, death, and doppelgangers. May your birthday be as passionate as a vampire's kiss and as eternal as our unbreakable bond. In this life and every other, you're my epic love story. 🧛‍♂️💖🌙
text1: Breaking News: World's Most Amazing Girlfriend Levels Up! 🎂
textInChatBox: Happy birthday, my love! I'd give you the moon, but I hear NASA has strict policies about that sort of thing.
text2: I was going to write you a love poem,
text3: But all I could come up with was,
text4: 'Roses are red, violets are blue, I'm not a poet, but I sure love
wishHeading: Happy Birthday to My Eternal Love Across All Timelines
outroText: If loving you is wrong, I don't want to be right. But seriously, is it wrong? I skipped that day in school.
replayText: Click here to experience this cheesy message again (I promise it ages like fine wine).
